title: adbhutanAm bAlakanAm ambujEkSaNam
sahitya:
adbhutanAm bAlakanAm ambujEkSaNAm anantanAm nanda mAyavanai vasudEvan kaNDu koNDAn


anupallavi

  vatsamenum maruvum mAlaiyum kaustubhamum mArbinilE viLanga mUlat-tattuva shankhamum 
cakkaramum gadaiyum tAmaraiyum nAlu kaigaLilinga metta oLi minnaladu nANa pItAmbaramum 
mEniyadu kArmukhilin nIla niramE taghavum muttu navarattina padakka makuTak-kaTakam munji 
puri nUlum aparanji maNi takkaNamum kATTi pazha vinaigaLOTTi karuNai vizhi kUTTi AnandamUTTi 
bhakti neri nATTi manda naghai kATTi karakamalam-ATTiya paramETTiyavan karuNai koLum


caraNam    kaNDAn kaNDu koNDAn aNDarum kANADa atishaya mAyavanaik-karpakamum nava nidhiyum 
kAmadhEnuvum bhuvanangaLai oru kuDaiyil kaTTik-kAvalUrum perum padamum kaivalyamum 
indirap-padaviyoDu siddhigaLeTTum idO enavum parai koTTi muzhakkiyum avaigaLai oru kaNam 
eTTik-kashandadena veruttiDum-uLam aTTiyillAda AnandamAga nIlat-tirumEniyanai nirumalanai 
nittiyanai nirAkAranai nirguNanai oru kaNa ninaivArkaDa nenjamiruppavanait-tattuvanai dAyakanait-
tArakanai shentAmaraiyALAga nAyakanai kaNNArat-tAnavanai tAnavanai tAnavanai tAnavanaik-
